description.narrative: Communication for Development (C4D), which contributes to Cross-Sectoral Communication For Development. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Evaluations, Research And Data, Operational Support To Programme Delivery, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: Effective and efficient Programme management and operations support to Programme delivery

participating-org.narrative: MINISTRY OF GENDER CHILDREN AND SOCIAL WELFARE

sector.narrative: Advocacy and partnership-building for social behaviour change
Capacity and skills development for social behaviour change
Research, monitoring and evaluation and knowledge management for C4D
Strengthening C4D in Government systems including preparedness for humanitarian action
Technical assistance - Cross-sectoral communication for development

title.narrative: Malawi United Nations Development Assistance Framework
Description of UNICEF programming approach framework at the country level with Common Country Assessments (CCAs) providing the equivalence of pre project appraisals
Interagency Humanitarian Response Assessments and Plans
UN Sustainable Development Group Database of Common Country Analyses
UNINFO Document Database to search for Common Country Analysis and Cooperation Framework

UNICEF procedure for programme implementation partnerships
UNICEF Contract Awards through the UN Global Marketplace
Malawi 2021 Annual Report on Results for Children

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

description.narrative: Evidence for C4D programming was generated, used for the finalisation of the C4D Strategic Framework 2019-2023 and supported the institutionalisation of integrated C4D programming. Target populations in 20 districts were reached with key messages and calls for action on essential practices on child survival and growth, protection and development. | Status:Met | As-of Date:13/12/2018

title.narrative: People in humanitarian situations receiving critical WASH related hygiene promotion messages and interventions to prevent water borne diseases particularly cholera and diarrhoea.
C4D programming strategy informed by evidence generated.
C4D programming strategy informed by evidence generated.
National Social Mobilization Committee established and capable of facilitating and coordinating national level and supports C4D interventions at district level.
